title: DeSantis says Disney 'crossed the line' for criticizing Parental Rights in Education bill - Fox Business
content:
1. DeSantis says Disney 'crossed the line' for criticizing Parental Rights in Education bill  Fox Business
  2. Actor Ron Perlman calls Florida Gov. DeSantis a 'Nazi piece of s---' over parental rights bill, gets blasted  Fox News
  3. Teachers fear the chilling effect of Florida's so-called 'Don't Say Gay' law  NPR
  4. Florida is outlawing the one thing that helped gay kids like me  WBUR
  5. We see through the lies, Gov. DeSantis, and know exactly what ‘Don’t Say Gay’ is all about | Opinion  Miami Herald
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has fired back at Disney after the entertainment giant said it would support efforts to have the Parental Rights in Education bill repealed by the state legislature or struck down in the courts after it was officially signed into law on Monday.
